channel.title: [PI] Client & Compile Error
channel.description:
hi guys, I have gotten a error in my compile and run. When I run it on eclipse it works perfectly fine. Run: http://prntscr.com/7rqruk Compile: http://prntscr.com/7rqrq0
Willing to pay $5.

item.title: [PI] Client & Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

If it works perfectly fine in eclipse, why use the .bat files? Just keep using eclipse…

But anyway, you need to (for the run) edit the java directory to the one you currently have. Ex, “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_##\bin\java.exe”

For both you need to import the commons library.

Also you cannot pay people, it’s against the forums rules.

Read full topic
